sourcesContent:
import { Add as AddIcon } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { Box, Button, Container, Paper, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow, Typography, } from '@mui/material'; import React from 'react'; function Patients() { // Örnek hasta verileri const patients = [ { id: 1, name: 'Ahmet Yılmaz', age: 45, phone: '555-0001', lastVisit: '2024-03-15' }, { id: 2, name: 'Ayşe Demir', age: 32, phone: '555-0002', lastVisit: '2024-03-14' }, { id: 3, name: 'Mehmet Kaya', age: 28, phone: '555-0003', lastVisit: '2024-03-13' }, { id: 4, name: 'Fatma Şahin', age: 55, phone: '555-0004', lastVisit: '2024-03-12' }, ]; return ( Hastalar ID Ad Soyad Yaş Telefon Son Ziyaret İşlemler {patients.map((patient) => ( {patient.id} {patient.name} {patient.age} {patient.phone} {patient.lastVisit} ))}
); } export default Patients;
